<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Standard">[Living Monolith](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=16)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup>

You have delved into ancient sphinx magic to imbue your body and soul with the patience and strength of stone, as you work to create a special magical ka stone to finalize your oaths.

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<additional-info>
**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Ancient Osiriani](/Languages.aspx?ID=40) and [Sphinx](/Languages.aspx?ID=35) languages; Trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

**Access**
You are from the Golden Road region.

**Archetype Category**
Faction

**Number of Feats** 7
</additional-info>
